thread.title: Immersion Technology Services Will Represent ELEARNINGFORCE International at HR Technology Conference 2015
thread.title_full: Immersion Technology Services Will Represent ELEARNINGFORCE International at HR Technology Conference 2015

author: prbuzz.com
title: Immersion Technology Services Will Represent ELEARNINGFORCE International at HR Technology Conference 2015
text:
Immersion Technology Services (ITS) will be representing ELEARNINGFORCE International at this year's HR Technology Conference & Exposition. Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas will play host to The World’s Biggest and Best Conference in HR technology, a four day extravaganza that kicks off on Sunday, October 18. The latest trends such as The Cloud, social, gamification, Big Data and MOOCs will be discussed and how they can be used to enrich business operations and advance overall profitability.
“Technology has become an essential component of every organization’s business and people strategies, and The HR Technology Conference is the world’s largest event that showcases how leading organizations are utilizing innovative technology solutions to solve their most pressing business challenges,” said Conference Co-Chair Steve Boese.
“We are very excited to be representing ELEARNINGFORCE at such an impactful event. Together we recognize the importance of organizational knowledge and a need to strategically harness this knowledge to drive success.” said Joe Schweitzer, Chief Learning Officer, ITS, “We look forward to sharing our perspective and learning from others about what they are doing today so that ultimately, we can help their organizations stay competitive.”
Immersion Technology Services will be providing insight into SharePoint LMS, an award-winning learning management system built on top of Microsoft technology, and how to maximize organizational learning and improve HR processes.
ITS will be representing ELEARNINGFORCE International at Booth 706. Click here for more information about the event and registration.
About Immersion Technology Services
Immersion Technology Services (ITS) creates Business Infrastructure Transformation solutions for its clients. The company provides expert consulting and professional services in three different segments: enterprise education (LMS), identity governance and administration (IGA), and migrations. ITS customers include leaders in the in commercial, government and military space. ITS is headquartered in Edgewater, Maryland with operations throughout the US & Canada.
ITS partners with industry leaders such as Dell and Microsoft Gold Partner ELEARNINGFORCE to support clients through processes related to enterprise Knowledge Management and Collaboration. For more about Immersion Technology Services, visit the company’s website at http://www.immersiontechnologyservices.com/
About ELEARNINGFORCE
ELEARNINGFORCE products bring effective learning management to SharePoint® and Office 365®. SharePoint LMS and LMS 365 blend seamlessly with any established SharePoint® infrastructure, eliminating complex integration, time-consuming development, and unwanted complexity. Learners intuitively access learning plans, courses, personal progress reports, certificates, and more - from anywhere within the daily SharePoint business process.
ELEARNINGFORCE International started in 2005 and has now 4+ million users in more than 40 countries worldwide. ELEARNINGFORCE is a Microsoft Strategic and Gold Partner. For more about ELEARNINGFORCE International, visit the company’s website at http://www.elearningforce.com/
